markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Nagaji](/Traits.aspx?ID=359)</title>

**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 309

Nagaji are brawny humanoids with scaled skin and serpentine heads, many of whom serve or respect nagas.
name: Nagaji
